news.title: Flock of Dimes Announces Tour and New Album, Shares Video for New Song: Watch

news.title: Stevie Nicks and Lindsey Buckingham Announce Long-Awaited Buckingham Nicks Reissue

news.title: Coldplay, Geordie Greep, and More Cover Black Sabbath to Honor Ozzy Osbourne: Watch

news.summary: The duo’s first new music since 2019

news.title: Watch Bright Eyes’ Video for New Song “1st World Blues”
news.summary: Conor Oberst and his bandmates described the song as “an homage to ska in all its waves”
